AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: defendant in a case involving a motion to suppress, truck driver
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: veteran narcotics investigator with 17 years of experience, testified to observations about the truck and scissor lift, witnessed two near-collisions, and contacted a patrol deputy for a traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Heather Vargas: relative newcomer to the narcotics division, involved in contacting a patrol deputy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: Deputy who initiated the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel: owner of the truck and trailer, first name mentioned by Federico Saldana
